trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANYOK104_05339_SEQ_00<tab>Vuyargur wishes for there to be light.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANYOK104_05339_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Yok Huy mountaineer in Solace.
TEXT_BANYOK104_05339_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the restoration glowstone to Vuyargur.
TEXT_BANYOK104_05339_VUYARGUR_000_001<tab>We Yok Huy use glowstone as a source of light in our homes, and we wish to employ it at the altar as well.
TEXT_BANYOK104_05339_VUYARGUR_000_002<tab>As the stone lies deep in the earth alongside fossilized matter, however, we must rely on seasoned mountaineers for its location and excavation.
TEXT_BANYOK104_05339_VUYARGUR_000_003<tab>I have tasked one such individual with the work to the north of Worlar's Echo. Might I trouble you to pay him a visit to see if he has found anything for us?
TEXT_BANYOK104_05339_VUYARGUR_000_004<tab>I have tasked our mountaineer with excavating glowstone again. Might I trouble you to pay him another visit to see if he has found anything for us?
TEXT_BANYOK104_05339_VUYARGUR_000_005<tab>As before, he should be performing his work to the north of Worlar's Echo. The way can be treacherous, so do take care with your footing.
TEXT_BANYOK104_05339_YOK05339_000_006<tab>Vuyargur sent you to collect the glowstone, did he? Here, take this.

TEXT_BANYOK104_05339_YOK05339_000_007<tab>That there is an exceptionally pure example, far rarer than what was requested and laborious to find. But in view of your efforts to restore peace to our land, I render it up gladly.
TEXT_BANYOK104_05339_YOK05339_000_008<tab>Ah, it's you again. Here for the glowstone, I take it. You may take this with you.

TEXT_BANYOK104_05339_YOK05339_000_009<tab>Should Vuyargur require more, I should be glad to provide. These old bones may creak more than they used to, but I consider it my little way of contributing to the cause.
TEXT_BANYOK104_05339_YOK05339_000_010<tab>I am counting on your success─we all are.
TEXT_BANYOK104_05339_VUYARGUR_000_011<tab>Did the mountaineer have glowstone for us?
TEXT_BANYOK104_05339_VUYARGUR_000_012<tab>Well now, this is a fine specimen indeed, of a quality befitting ceremonial use. It is very generous of him to yield such.
TEXT_BANYOK104_05339_VUYARGUR_000_013<tab>Perhaps you already know this, but we Yok Huy have a ritual whereby we prolong the radiance of glowstone by sprinkling it with saltwater imbued with prayers.
TEXT_BANYOK104_05339_VUYARGUR_000_014<tab>We Yok Huy have a tradition whereby we prolong the radiance of glowstone by sprinkling it with saltwater imbued with prayers.
TEXT_BANYOK104_05339_VUYARGUR_000_015<tab>Those prayers harbor the desire for our lives to endure in serenity, like the stone's gentle glow.
TEXT_BANYOK104_05339_VUYARGUR_000_016<tab>I shall pray for the same as I put this glowstone to use in our work. My thanks for the delivery, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
